Index.title: Web Games
Index.description: A modern web games collection built with Next.js

config.name: Play Hub
config.description: Web Game is a platform for playing games.

2048.description: A simple and addictive number puzzle game. Slide and merge matching numbers to reach 2048!

sudoku.title: Sudoku
sudoku.description: Classic number puzzle game. Fill a 9x9 grid with numbers 1-9 so each row, column, and 3x3 box contains all digits.

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.description: Classic minesweeper game. Use logic to find all mines without triggering them. Be careful where you click!

snake.title: Snake
snake.description: Classic arcade snake game. Control the snake to eat food and grow longer, but don't hit the walls or yourself!

metadata.title: 2048 - Number Puzzle Game
metadata.description: Play the addictive 2048 puzzle game! Combine numbers, reach 2048, and challenge your strategic thinking. A perfect blend of math and strategy.

settings.title: Game Settings
settings.difficultyDesc: Choose preset difficulty or customize settings
settings.initialTilesDesc: Number of tiles at game start (1-6)

rules.title: Game Rules
content: Use arrow keys to move tiles
Tiles with the same number merge when they collide
A new number appears after each move
Game ends when no moves are possible

controls.title: Controls
content: WASD keys: W A S D

scoring.title: Scoring Rules
content: Merge larger numbers for higher scores

metadata.title: Sudoku - Classic Number Puzzle
metadata.description: Challenge yourself with the classic Sudoku puzzle game. Fill the grid with numbers using logic and deduction. Multiple difficulty levels available!
metadata.keywords: sudoku, sudoku puzzle, number game, logic game, brain game, free sudoku, online sudoku, daily sudoku, sudoku solver, classic sudoku

metadata.title: Minesweeper - Classic Puzzle Game
metadata.description: Play the classic Minesweeper game, featuring Google Doodle style gameplay. Test your logic and memory skills. Challenge yourself in this globally popular puzzle game!
metadata.keywords: minesweeper, minesweeper game, google minesweeper, online minesweeper, classic minesweeper, free minesweeper, browser minesweeper, puzzle game, logic game, strategy game

metadata.title: Snake - Classic Arcade Game
metadata.description: Play the classic Snake game! Control the snake's direction using keyboard, eat food to grow longer. Test your reflexes and strategy in this timeless arcade game!
metadata.keywords: snake game, classic snake, online snake, arcade game, free snake game, browser snake, retro game

controls.controls: Use arrow keys or WASD to control
